error_404: You have no right to access this page.
error_no_user: No account with that email address was found.
error_password_match: The two passwords do not match.
error_scene_update: A problem occurred while updating the scenes. Please try again.
error_fields_empty: Please fill in all the required information.
error_token: Password reset token is invalid or has expired.
name: name
control_video: Create a video of the tour
property_delete_question: Do you really want to delete this property (along with its scenes)?
scene_create_upload: Upload the 360 picture of the scene :
scene_create_help: Add the first scene to create the property, you will be able to add more scenes afterward.
scene_arrow_no_scene: New arrows cannot be edited, please refresh page
scene_set_arrow: Drag & drop the arrow on the scene
property_create_upload: Upload a cover picture for the property :
email_reset_token:
You are receiving this because you (or someone else) have requested the reset of the password for your account.

Please click on the following link, or paste this into your browser to complete the process:

http://{{host}}/api/users/reset/{{token}}

If you did not request this, please ignore this email and your password will remain unchanged.
email_reset_token_confirm: An e-mail has been sent to %s with further instructions.
email_reset_success_confirm: Your password has been changed successfully.
account_close_question: Do you really want to close this account ? This will delete all your data.
set_scene_order_explanation: If you have a cursor, you can also use drag & drop to reorder the scenes.
video_instruction: Please wait for the whole visit to be complete, or click stop to have a partial video.
cardboard_info: Put your mobile into a cardboard viewer. Gaze a few seconds at a target to go to the next scene.
